headline: WM CFO Devina Rankin to Retire David Reed to Succeed Rankin
summary: HOUSTON, August 21, 2025--WM (NYSE: WM) announced that Devina Rankin, executive vice president and chief financial officer, is planning to retire. After nearly 23 successful years with the company, Rankin has decided to dedicate focus to her long-standing passions for education and not-for-profit service. She will transition out of the CFO role in November 2025 and will remain as an executive advisor to ensure an effective transition through March 2026.
